claim: Codex audit identified 5 P0-P1 critical violations in CP files blocking authenticity compliance
synthesized_finding: Codex comprehensive audit validated 77 violations total; 5 are P0-P1 critical (CP stub code, placeholder scoring, non-deterministic time, missing requests dependency, protocol mismatch). P0 scorer.py stub returns hardcoded stage/confidence without @allow-const annotation, blocking authenticity_ast gate.
note_on_relevance: CRITICAL - Identifies blocking violations not covered by AV-001; provides exact file/line references for remediation.

claim: SCA v13.8 protocol requires authentic computation in CP with no placeholders unless explicitly annotated
synthesized_finding: Protocol ยง6 Validators & Hard Gates specifies authenticity_ast and placeholders_cp validators block on TODO/FIXME/hardcoded literals in CP. Zero tolerance for placeholders per ยง0.1. Allowed exceptions require # @allow-const:<reason> comment plus test demonstrating varied-input behavior.
note_on_relevance: CRITICAL - Defines compliance requirements; establishes that current CP violations block validation gates.

claim: Determinism requires fixed time via get_audit_time() infrastructure proven in AR-001 task
synthesized_finding: AR-001 implemented Clock abstraction (libs/utils/clock.py, libs/utils/determinism.py) with get_audit_time() function for deterministic time. Proven via 3-run verification producing byte-identical outputs. Direct datetime.now() calls violate determinism requirement.
note_on_relevance: HIGH - Provides working implementation pattern; demonstrates that determinism infrastructure exists and works.
